SELECT id, refund_id, payment_sn, payment_type, payment_amount, payment_status, payment_time, payment_channel, payment_trade_no, payment_fee, remark, create_time, update_time FROM refund_payment
AND refund_id LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.refundId}, '%')
AND payment_sn LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.paymentSn}, '%')
AND payment_type LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.paymentType}, '%')
AND payment_status LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.paymentStatus}, '%')
AND payment_channel LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.paymentChannel}, '%')
AND payment_trade_no LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.paymentTradeNo}, '%')
